description: Complete RETEC careers database - Original 15 + 50 new careers

careers.description: Designs and builds roads, bridges, and buildings. Oversees construction projects and ensures structural safety.
daily_tasks: Calculate structural loads and material requirements
Inspect construction sites for safety compliance
Design infrastructure systems (roads, bridges, water supply)

careers.description: Works with machines and moving parts. Designs, builds, and maintains mechanical systems.
daily_tasks: Calculate forces, torque, and mechanical advantage

careers.description: Manages construction costs and budgets. Calculates material quantities and project expenses.
Designs power systems and wiring. Installs and maintains electrical systems in buildings and infrastructure.
daily_tasks: Calculate electrical loads and circuit requirements

careers.description: Builds software, hardware, and robots. Designs automated systems and intelligent machines.
Designs buildings and structures. Creates functional and aesthetic spaces while ensuring safety and regulations.
Starts and runs their own business. Identifies opportunities, manages resources, and creates value.
Promotes products and services. Creates advertising campaigns and builds brand awareness.
daily_tasks: Analyze customer data and market trends
Manage social media and online presence

careers.description: Manages financial records and reports. Tracks income, expenses, and ensures financial compliance.
Sells products or services directly to customers. Builds relationships and closes deals.
Creates visual content for brands and businesses. Designs logos, packaging, advertisements, and digital content.
daily_tasks: Design logos, posters, and marketing materials
Meet with clients to understand their needs
Prepare files for printing or digital use

careers.description: Provides financial services to customers. Manages accounts, processes transactions, and offers financial advice.
Oversees retail store operations. Manages staff, inventory, sales, and customer service.
daily_tasks: Calculate sales, profits, and inventory levels
Analyze sales data and make business decisions

careers.description: Provides mobile money services to the community. Processes cash-in, cash-out, and transfer transactions.
Educates and trains students. Develops lesson plans, delivers instruction, and assesses learning.
daily_tasks: Communicate with parents about student progress

careers.description: Provides direct patient care in hospitals, clinics, and communities. Administers medications, monitors vital signs, and educates patients about health.
daily_tasks: Monitor patient vital signs (temperature, blood pressure, pulse)
Calculate medication dosages based on patient weight
Record patient observations and medical history
Educate patients on health and disease prevention

careers.description: Diagnoses and treats illnesses and injuries. Prescribes medications and performs medical procedures to improve patient health.
daily_tasks: Interpret laboratory test results and X-rays
Calculate medication dosages for different patient conditions
Perform medical procedures and minor surgeries

careers.description: Dispenses medications and advises patients on proper drug use. Ensures medication safety and effectiveness.
daily_tasks: Check for drug interactions and allergies
Counsel patients on medication use and side effects

careers.description: Performs medical tests on patient samples. Analyzes blood, urine, and tissue samples to help diagnose diseases.
daily_tasks: Collect and prepare patient samples for testing
Perform blood tests, urinalysis, and culture tests

careers.description: Operates X-ray and imaging equipment to help diagnose medical conditions. Produces images of bones, organs, and tissues.
daily_tasks: Operate X-ray, CT, and MRI machines

careers.description: Provides care to pregnant women before, during, and after childbirth. Assists in deliveries and educates mothers on infant care.
daily_tasks: Calculate due dates and fetal development timelines
Educate mothers on breastfeeding and infant care

careers.description: Creates computer programs and applications. Writes code to solve problems and build software solutions.
daily_tasks: Test software for bugs and errors

careers.description: Builds and maintains websites. Creates both the visual design and functional backend of web applications.
Analyzes data to help businesses make informed decisions. Uses statistics and software to find patterns and insights.
daily_tasks: Collect and clean data from multiple sources

careers.description: Designs, implements, and maintains computer networks. Ensures reliable internet and data connectivity.
Protects computer systems and networks from cyber attacks. Monitors for threats and implements security measures.
daily_tasks: Educate staff on security best practices

careers.description: Creates clothing and accessory designs. Sketches designs, selects fabrics, and oversees garment production.
daily_tasks: Price garments based on materials and labor

careers.description: Sews and alters clothing. Takes measurements and creates custom-fitted garments for clients.
daily_tasks: Calculate fabric needed for each garment
Sew garments using machines and hand stitching

careers.description: Creates patterns and designs for fabrics. Works with colors, prints, and textures for fashion and home textiles.
Researches and reports news stories. Interviews people, investigates issues, and writes articles or produces broadcasts.
daily_tasks: Use social media and digital tools

careers.description: Edits video footage for films, TV shows, advertisements, and online content. Combines clips, adds effects, and creates final video products.
Captures images using cameras. Works in events, portraits, commercial photography, or photojournalism.
daily_tasks: Set up camera settings (ISO, aperture, shutter speed)

careers.description: Creates digital content for social media, YouTube, or blogs. Builds an online audience and may earn through sponsorships and ads.
daily_tasks: Engage with audience and respond to comments

careers.description: Studies crop production and soil management. Advises farmers on best practices for growing healthy, productive crops.
daily_tasks: Test soil for nutrient content and pH levels

careers.description: Manages animal farms including cattle, poultry, goats, or pigs. Ensures animal health, feeding, and production.
Develops new food products and improves food processing methods. Ensures food safety, quality, and nutrition.
daily_tasks: Test food samples for safety and quality
Develop new food products and recipes
Analyze shelf life and preservation methods
Ensure compliance with food safety regulations

careers.description: Educates farmers on modern farming techniques. Links farmers to resources, training, and government programs.
daily_tasks: Train farmers on new farming methods
Demonstrate use of improved seeds and fertilizers
Connect farmers to markets and credit
Advise on pest and disease control

careers.description: Educates and trains students. Develops lesson plans, delivers instruction, and assesses learning.
daily_tasks: Communicate with parents about student progress

careers.description: Manages school operations and staff. Oversees curriculum implementation, discipline, and school improvement.
Designs educational programs and learning materials. Creates curriculum that aligns with educational standards and student needs.
daily_tasks: Create lesson plans and teaching materials

careers.description: Represents clients in legal matters. Provides legal advice, prepares documents, and argues cases in court.
Maintains law and order, prevents crime, and protects citizens. Investigates crimes and enforces laws.
Responds to fire emergencies and rescues people. Provides emergency medical care and fire prevention education.
daily_tasks: Respond to fire and emergency calls

careers.description: Buys goods from other countries to sell locally, or sells local goods internationally. Manages international trade operations.
Sells insurance policies to individuals and businesses. Advises clients on coverage options and processes claims.
Examines financial records to ensure accuracy and compliance. Identifies financial risks and recommends improvements.
Measures and maps land boundaries. Uses specialized equipment to determine property lines and land features.
Plans and designs interior spaces. Creates functional and aesthetically pleasing environments for homes and businesses.
daily_tasks: Calculate room dimensions and space planning
Prepare design drawings and mood boards

careers.description: Installs and repairs heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems. Maintains climate control equipment.
Installs and repairs water supply and drainage systems. Works on pipes, fixtures, and water-related equipment.
daily_tasks: Calculate pipe sizes and water pressure

careers.description: Joins metal parts using welding equipment. Creates metal structures and repairs metal components.
daily_tasks: Join metal parts using various welding methods

careers.description: Builds and repairs wooden structures and furniture. Works with wood to create buildings, cabinets, and fixtures.
Lays bricks, blocks, and stones to build walls and structures. Creates foundations and structural elements.
daily_tasks: Calculate number of blocks or bricks needed
Lay blocks in straight, level courses
Use measuring tools to ensure accuracy

careers.description: Cuts, styles, and treats hair. Provides hair care services including coloring, braiding, and chemical treatments.
daily_tasks: Mix hair color chemicals in correct ratios

careers.description: Prepares and cooks food in restaurants, hotels, or catering services. Creates menus and manages kitchen operations.
daily_tasks: Price menu items based on costs

careers.description: Oversees hotel operations including guest services, staff management, and business performance. Ensures guest satisfaction.
daily_tasks: Set room rates and pricing strategies

careers.description: Leads tourists to attractions and provides information about historical sites, culture, and local areas.
daily_tasks: Calculate tour costs and group sizes

careers.description: Transports people or goods safely. Includes taxi drivers, delivery drivers, and commercial truck drivers.
Plans and coordinates the movement of goods. Manages supply chains, warehousing, and distribution.
Assists pharmacists in dispensing medications. Manages inventory, serves customers, and maintains pharmacy records.
daily_tasks: Serve customers and answer basic questions

careers.description: Provides emergency medical care before hospital arrival. Responds to accidents and medical emergencies.
Helps people buy, sell, or rent properties. Shows properties, negotiates deals, and processes paperwork.
daily_tasks: Negotiate deals between buyers and sellers

careers.description: Helps vulnerable individuals and families. Provides support services, counseling, and connects people to resources.
daily_tasks: Advocate for client rights and services

careers.description: Installs, maintains, and repairs electrical systems in buildings and infrastructure.
daily_tasks: Calculate electrical loads and circuit requirements

careers.description: Installs and maintains solar energy systems. Sets up solar panels and ensures optimal energy production.
daily_tasks: Install solar panels on roofs and structures
Wire solar systems to electrical grids
